body: Turns out it's because `removeAll` is in v4 of Immutable, and we're on v3. I've switched the code over to using two `remove`s, which I don't love, but eventually we can upgrade the package and revert it to use `removeAll`.
body_text: Turns out it's because removeAll is in v4 of Immutable, and we're on v3. I've switched the code over to using two removes, which I don't love, but eventually we can upgrade the package and revert it to use removeAll.
body_html: Turns out it's because removeAll is in v4 of Immutable, and we're on v3. I've switched the code over to using two removes, which I don't love, but eventually we can upgrade the package and revert it to use removeAll.
